April 10, 1950 D Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 10 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-leicester-brass-band-festival-champ-934
Eugene Onegin [arr. Godfrey]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50, 2nd £30, 3rd £20, 4th £10. 23rd Annual Contest. 11 bands competed.
Dec. 8, 2011, 12:55 p.m. March 6, 2019, 10:35 a.m.

2 Finedon Old Prize Band A. G. Remington
3 Hanwell Band George Thompson
4 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Eric Ball
5 Appleby Frodingham Works William H. Kendall
